statements: UPDATE strategy SET strategy_description = 'New description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trade SET entry_price = 1500.00, exit_price = 1520.00 WHERE trade_id = 1001;
UPDATE performance SET total_returns = 5000.00, max_drawdown = 200.00, total_trades = 50 WHERE performance_id = 2001;
UPDATE users SET username='updated_username' WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE stocks SET stock_price=1500.00 WHERE stock_id=2
UPDATE orders SET order_quantity=50, order_price=2000.00 WHERE order_id=3
UPDATE algo_trading.stocks SET price = 100.50, volume = 500 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE algo_trading.portfolio SET quantity = 200 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE algo_trading.trades SET quantity = 50, trade_type = 'BUY' WHERE trade_id = 101;
